title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 650/87 of 4 March 1987 fixing the standard fee per farm return for the 1987 accounting year of the Farm Accountancy Data Network
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 650/87
of 4 March 1987
fixing the standard fee per farm return for the 1987 accounting year of the Farm Accountancy Data Network
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The standard fee paid the Commission to Member States for each duly completed farm return is hereby fixed at 90 ECU for the 1987 accounting year.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply for the 1987 accounting year.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 4 March 1987.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
